title: 领地插件Residence随机传送问题
author: yanshuchen
txt_content:
在服务器中 world 世界可以随机传送其他世界不可以传送 提示说。无法找到正确的传送位置，请 5 秒后再试。
应该是在某配置文件中。我找不到。后台输入会显示 可用世界:world
只有world是可用的。
怎么让其他世界也可以用呢

replies.author: fanglys
replies.txt_content:
RandomTeleportation:
    # World name to use this feature. Add annother one with appropriate name to enable random teleportation
    world: 
      # Max coordinate to teleport, setting to 1000, player can be teleported between -1000 and 1000 coordinates
      MaxCoord: 1000
      # If maxcord set to 1000 and mincord to 500, then player can be teleported between -1000 to -500 and 1000 to 500 coordinates
      MinCord: 500
      CenterX: 0
      CenterZ: 0
    world1: 
      # Max coordinate to teleport, setting to 1000, player can be teleported between -1000 and 1000 coordinates
      MaxCoord: 1000
      # If maxcord set to 1000 and mincord to 500, then player can be teleported between -1000 to -500 and 1000 to 500 coordinates
      MinCord: 500
      CenterX: 0
      CenterZ: 0

就像这样添加一个世界。

replies.author: yanshuchen
replies.txt_content:
fanglys 发表于 2017-5-25 22:48
RandomTeleportation:
    # World name to use this feature. Add annother one with appropriate name  ...
非常感谢你
